articles.title: Bengaluru Malls Including Phoenix Mall of Asia Closed For Day Amid Protests Over Language Row - Times Now
articles.description: Protests by the Karnataka Rakshana Vedike led to the closure of many Bengaluru malls, including the Phoenix Mall of Asia. The activists were protesting against businesses that did not display Kannada signage. The protests caused a significant traffic jam on B…
